name: Click The Circle (GuyWithTime)
description:
A OSU-like clicker game, where Circles spawn Randomly on the screen and you have to Click Them before they dissapear and you lose a life. 

Your goal is to try to get a new highscore    (Mine is 199 :D)

[CONTROLS]

  • Pause - Escape or Tab out
  • Delete highscore - X + A + Delete (In that order!)

[START MENU THINGYS]

  • Switch between Dark- and Lightmode - Rope on the top right
  • Mute/Unmute sounds - Mute button on the top left

[OTHER THINGS]

  • Most sounds were made using SFXR

I made this game in like a month when I had time to work on it to see how much knowledge I gained in ~6 months of learning how to make games.
